item.title: SciML
item.description: The objective of this project is to develop and use machine learning methods to address challenges in engineering analysis, including data integration and digital twins.

item.title: SciANN
item.description: SciANN: A Keras wrapper for scientific computations and physics-informed deep learning using artificial neural networks.

item.title: vFEMLab
item.description: A vectorized FEM MATLAB library using the implicit interface methods.

item.title: NextMeal
item.description:
We are offering a platform that extracts the ingredients of your favorite meals , generates personalized flavor profiles and provides recommendations from all cuisines in the neighborhood. This way, not only you will find your personal meal recommendations, for instance most rated burger, but also recommendations from other cuisines that share similar ingredients, such as Mediterranean Kafta or Indian Kebab or Japanese ground beef.

We propose the application of a deep learning framework NRT which can simultaneously predict precise ratings and generate abstractive tips with good linguistic quality simulating user experience and feelings.
